title: Supreme Court draws a clear line between splurging on freebies and investing State largesse for public welfare
content: Supreme Court asks why there is no dedicated diversion of revenue surplus for developmental purposes, which would further the constitutional ideal of inclusivity through free medical care and education for the poor

title: Karnataka Governor likely to skip portions of text in his address to State legislature
content: Thaawarchand Gehlot has expressed reservations over 11 paragraphs in the speech prepared by the Congress government in Karnataka; these paragraphs include strong criticism of the Central government for introducing the VB-G RAM G Act

title: CAQM submits long-term steps to curb air pollution; Supreme Court asks Delhi authorities to act
content: The measures include phasing out polluting vehicles from Delhi-NCR, fortifying the pollution-under-check regime, augmentation of rail transport and metro models, revised electric vehicle policy, etc.

title: Why are landless tribals and farmers protesting in Maharashtra? | The Hindu Explains
content: Thousands of farmers and tribals from areas like Vasai, and the tehsils of Palghar, including Charoti, Manor, Wada, Vikramgad, Talasari, and Mokhed, participated in the “long march” protest led by Communist Party of India (Marxist) from Charoti to Palghar Collector office covering about 60 km on foot. The protest started on January 19, 2026, and continued on January 20, 2026 at the Palghar Collector office, where the demonstrators will stay till all the demands are fulfilled. What are their demands?

title: Opposition slams transfer of magistrate who ordered FIR against cops in Sambhal violence case
content: Sambhal CJM Vibhanshu Sudheer transferred to Sultanpur as Civil Judge (Senior Division) days after the FIR direction; “politically motivated”, says Congress; undermines judicial independence, say lawyers

title: Supreme Court tells States to frame policy on police media briefing in three months
content: The manual prepared by the amicus curiae upholds the integrity of investigations, noting that the police “communicate to prevent harm, correct rumours, enlist public cooperation and maintain law and order”

title: Madras High Court accepts Chennai Corporation’s revised layout map restricting number of shops in Marina beach to 300
content: Justices R. Suresh Kumar and A.D. Jagadish Chandira appoint retired Chief Justice N. Paul Vasanthakumar to monitor drawal of lots for allotment of those shops

title: Dhaka declared ‘non-family’ station due to ‘deteriorating’ security situation: Indian officials
content: This is a precautionary measure due to the threat of mob attacks against Indian missions, officials say, with tensions rising ahead of the February 12 election; will not hurt diplomatic, consular activities

title: Lancet experts call for ‘citizen-centric’ healthcare, pitch for India’s role in Global South
content: The commission said with “WHO facing serious difficulties and the U.S. Government in retreat from global health”, India can be “an even stronger voice for the Global South”

title: Hical Technologies rolls out ‘Corporate Commute’ to encourage employees to shift to public transport
content: The STAMP challenge is led by WRI India and the Toyota Mobility Foundation, with support from industry and transport stakeholders including ELCIA, ELCITA, BMRCL and BMTC

title: Government mulls Trump Gaza board invitation, as leaders of Israel, UAE join
content: Sources say Arab leaders to be consulted at conference on January 30-31; Modi expected to travel to West Asia, Israel soon

title: Controversy erupts in U.P. over notice to religious leader over use of ‘Shankaracharya’ title
content: The tug of war between the authorities and Mr. Saraswati started during the Magh Mela, an annual month-long religious fair in which devotees assemble at the Triveni Sangam, the confluence of the rivers Ganga, Yamuna, and the mythical Saraswati, for a holy dip

title: Cabinet nod for ₹404-crore second phase of Chellanam seawall project
content: Funds for the project will be mobilised through the Kerala Infrastructure Investment Fund Board, while Kerala Irrigation Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited has been assigned as the special purpose vehicle to implement the project

title: Stormy session likely on new job scheme and more
content: While Congress has said that VB-G RAM G Act that replaces MGNREGA weakens livelihood security, Opposition BJP and JD(S) has insisted that it is aimed at correcting issues in the old scheme

title: Bengaluru Suburban Rail Project deadline pushed to 2030 from Oct. 2026
content: It was sanctioned in October 2020 after decades of deliberation and was envisioned as a high-capacity commuter rail system carrying nearly 20 lakh passengers daily

title: All six stanzas of Vande Mataram to get the spotlight in Culture Ministry’s Republic Day tableau
content: In Parliament, PM had accused the Congress of “sabotage”, sowing the seeds of Partition by adopting only the first two stanzas as the national song

title: Around 3.26 crore Uttar Pradesh voters could get SIR hearing notices
content: Of these 3.26 crore people, the names of nearly 1.04 crore could not be mapped to the 2003 voter lists when the last SIR had been conducted, while 2.22 crore had “logical discrepancies” in mapping

title: Students told to pursue education with Constitution as guiding force
content: Grand procession, cultural programmes mark the 906th birth anniversary celebrations of Sri Nijasharana Ambigara Chowdaiah in Kalaburagi

title: BJP accuses Rahul Gandhi of lip service on Scheduled Caste representation
content: The allegation follows a video clip circulating on social media in which former Punjab CM and Congress MP Charanjit Singh Channi is purportedly heard seeking greater SC representation in the party

title: ‘Krushi Road Map’ to achieve 15% GVA growth in agriculture
content: Eight-member committee of the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers’ Welfare discusses the initiative, promises support for infrastructure creation and technology adoption

title: Foundation stone for AM/NS plant to be laid in A.P. after February 15
content: A.P. Chief Minister hold talks with Calibo AI and Tamara Leisure Experiences among others at World Economic Forum meet in Davos

title: Woman goes missing but found murdered in Dharwad
content: She left her house on Tuesday at 4.30 p.m. on some work pertaining to applying for a job but did not return

title: Face ‘corrupt power’ with courage, Rahul Gandhi tells Congress district chiefs
content: No one can silence your voice because a strong organisation like the Congress supports you. We will regularly evaluate your progress and provide guidance and support whenever needed, says Congress leader Rahul Gandhi

title: Congress alleges BJP voter deletion drive in Thrissur ahead of polls
content: DCC president says BJP filed Form 7 applications to remove voters traditionally aligned with the UDF; seeks intervention of Election Commission

title: District-level medical teams to study factors leading to maternal, infant mortalities
content: They will submit reports to the Health Department, following which an action plan will be put in place to bring down the number of deaths, says Health Minister Satya Kumar

title: SIR a peaceful political genocide, says Parakala Prabhakar
content: Economist warns that intensive voter list revision is aimed at excluding dissenters and minorities, undermining the Constitution

title: No appeals filed after Bihar SIR: CEC Gyanesh Kumar
content: Delivering his inaugural address at the India International Conference on Democracy and Election Management (IICDEM) 2026, Mr. Kumar says a “pure” voters’ list is key to strengthening democracy.

title: Kalyana Vedika in Tirumala turns into an ideal  destination for couples entering wedlock
content: With 26,777 marriages solemnised since its launch on April 25, 2016, the venue offers free, dignified weddings to Hindu couples under the aegis of the Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams

title: Clash between tourists and drivers clouds Munnar’s image as safe destination
content: In a recent incident, a clash occurred between a group of tourists from Karunagappally in Kollam and local taxi drivers over the former’s attempt  to take photograph on a parked MUV at the hill station

title: Expert team’s three-day visit to Polavaram project concludes
content: The team conducts around nine hours of field-level inspections and nearly 12 hours of in-depth review meetings during its visit

title: A.P. plans to get ‘Amaravati Bill’ passed in Budget Session of Parliament
content: The government feels the need to have Section 5(2) of the A.P. Reorganisation Act amended to legally fortify Amaravati’s position as the State capital

title: 'You should've never been born': How Buss family infighting drove the $10B sale of the Lakers
content: The post-Jerry Buss era was defined by resentment, dysfunction and conflict -- and ended with the loss of the most valuable family-owned franchise in the world.

title: Bills owner: Coaches pushed to draft Coleman
content: Sean McDermott and the Bills' coaching staff pushed the organization to draft Keon Coleman, according to owner Terry Pegula.

title: QB Allen may need surgery, would be OTAs ready
content: Bills quarterback Josh Allen might need to undergo right foot surgery, though a procedure is not expected to affect his availability for OTAs.

title: Former Alabama standout granted TRO to return
content: Charles Bediako, a former Alabama standout who entered the NBA draft in 2023, has been granted a temporary restraining order to return to the team, a judge ruled Wednesday.

title: Seth Jones to miss Games, replaced by LaCombe
content: Panthers defenseman Seth Jones won't play for the U.S. at the Milan Cortina Olympics because of an upper-body injury and has been replaced by Ducks defenseman Jackson LaCombe.

title: Mayfield takes swipe at ex-coach Stefanski in post
content: Buccaneers quarterback Baker Mayfield jabbed at new Falcons coach Kevin Stefanski, saying, "Can't wait to see you twice a year, Coach."

title: Sources: McDaniel set to become Chargers OC
content: Former Dolphins coach Mike McDaniel is expected to become the Chargers' offensive coordinator, sources told ESPN.

title: UCLA's Cronin blasts Big Ten over scheduling
content: UCLA's upset of No. 4 Purdue seemed to do little to ease Mick Cronin's wrath over the Big Ten's scheduling, with the Bruins coach saying, "I don't think they care about basketball."

title: Man City players to refund fans after Bodø loss
content: Manchester City's captains have announced they will refund the cost of tickets for nearly 400 supporters.

title: New NFL mock draft alert! Kiper projects all 32 first-round picks, including new homes for two QBs
content: Where will national title game standouts Fernando Mendoza and Akheem Mesidor land in Round 1? And could we really see six WRs in the opening 32 picks?

title: Predicting 68 starting quarterbacks for 2026
content: We're nine months from the 2026 season starting, but we're looking at every power team's QB situation.

title: Our reporters look ahead to the NFL draft: Big questions for every team selecting in the top 10
content: We're three months away from the 2026 NFL draft. What's the latest on each team picking in the top 10? Our reporters weigh in.

title: NBA Power Rankings: Biggest questions for all 30 teams at midseason
content: What are the biggest questions hovering above all 30 teams midway through the season, and where do the teams land in this week's rankings?

title: NBA All-Star rosters: Starters, snubs and biggest questions
content: Who was the biggest surprise or snub? Which superstar duo are we most excited to see? Experts break it down.

title: Welcoming the HOF Class of 2026: Why Carlos Beltran and Andruw Jones got in
content: Cooperstown welcomed two new players Tuesday night. Here's why the center fielders are headed to the Hall.

title: Baseball Hall of Fame voting winners, losers and who could get in next
content: The results are in! Our experts break down the highs and lows of the 2026 vote and look ahead to 2027.

title: Stacking the NBA's most valuable players at 10 distinct skills: Where SGA ranks No. 1
content: Who needs the eye test? This metric shows the NBA's best players at several categories based on every line of the play-by-play.

title: Reranking men's college basketball Freshman of the Year contenders
content: Darryn Peterson has finally entered the top 10, along with two other players. Cameron Boozer remains No. 1.

title: Bracketology: Don't write off Houston just yet
content: The Cougars remain national title contenders despite falling off the radar at the turn of the calendar year.

title: Power Rankings: Iowa, Ohio State soar into top 10 -- but can they stay there?
content: The Big Ten and Big 12 are winners as Ohio State, Iowa and Baylor crack the top 10. UConn stays No. 1.

title: Bracketology: Big nonconference win boosts Ohio State to a 3-seed
content: Results Sunday and Monday shook up the top 16, and the Buckeyes benefited the most, climbing two seed lines.

title: Are Patriots QB Drake Maye's turnovers an issue against the Broncos?
content: The Broncos' defense is the best in the league at getting to the quarterback. How will the Patriots respond?

title: Ranking the top 50 players in the Olympics: Why MacKinnon is No. 1
content: As 12 teams face off for gold in Milan Cortina, here are the players who will have the biggest impact.

title: 'We would have a great team': What Russian NHLers are saying about missing the Olympics
content: Russia is suspended from international competition due to the war in Ukraine, sidelining many players.

title: MMA Rank 50-1: Which stars could shine the brightest in 2026?
content: Makhachev, Topruia or Chimaev? ESPN ranks the top 50 fighters in MMA based on how they will perform in 2026.

title: CFP takeaways: Even as a favored Goliath, Indiana's win stands alone in sports history
content: Put it next to the Miracle on Ice or NC State and Villanova. In a wild title game, here's how Indiana beat Miami.

title: Wetzel: Hoosiers delivered a national title for the everyman
content: Curt Cignetti's relentless group of discards and misfits showed what the transfer portal made possible.

title: Vinícius Júnior's future at Real Madrid: Stay, exit or run contract down?
content: Vinícius Júnior has returned to form for Real Madrid, but what should he do about his future at the club? Here are his options.

title: 'Hire and fire': The exhausting job of a soccer manager in 2026
content: Europe's coaching merry-go-round is in full swing. So, what's it like to be on the receiving end of that pressure?

title: USMNT World Cup big board 4.0: Pochettino's roster coming into focus
content: We're less than five months away from the USMNT's World Cup opener, and with the clock ticking down, Mauricio Pochettino's squad is coming into focus.

title: 'Are you happy?': Cignetti's daughter revisits viral 2019 post after father's national title win
content: In 2019, Natalie asked her father if he was happy. He wasn't. Now, his answer to the same question is different.

title: How to bet the American Express: Is it worth betting on Scottie Scheffler to win?
content: The second stop of the PGA Tour brings us short, scorable courses and Scottie Scheffler's first start.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United explore Loftus-Cheek loan
content: Manchester United are exploring their options over a move for AC Milan's Ruben Loftus-Cheek. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: 'We're going to have a good deal': Trump shares update on India-US trade talks; praises PM Modi
content: US President Donald Trump has voiced confidence in the future of India–US trade relations, signalling optimism about concluding a trade deal. Praising Prime Minister Narendra Modi as a close friend, Trump said he has great respect for him

title: Musk-Ryanair CEO feud: Michael O’Leary agrees with Tesla CEO; shares good news
content: Ryanair CEO Michael O'Leary has embraced Elon Musk's insults, revealing the public spat has significantly boosted website traffic and bookings.  To capitalize on the attention, Ryanair launched a "Big Idiots Seat Sale," offering 100,000 seats for just £17. O'Leary even invited Musk to invest and offered him a free flight to experience the service firsthand.

title: Since 2021, rule by rule: How the Taliban have erased women from public life
content: Since the Taliban's return in August 2021, Afghan women's basic freedoms have been systematically curtailed, transforming them into privileges. Girls are barred from secondary education and universities, most jobs are off-limits, and public spaces are restricted, severely shrinking women's public existence amid economic collapse.

title: When 'blood spread at crease' and Ganguly used all 11 players as bowlers in Test
content: The 2002 Antigua Test between India and West Indies is remembered for Anil Kumble's courageous bowling with a broken jaw.  Beyond this, it marked a rare occasion where all eleven Indian players bowled in an innings.  The match, which ended in a draw, also saw Ajay Ratra become the youngest wicketkeeper to score a Test century at the time.

title: 'ChatGPT is dying': Legendary investor says $500bn company faces collapse— read his 600-word note
content: Veteran investor George Noble warns OpenAI is "falling apart" despite its $500 billion valuation. He cites internal "Code Red" alerts, declining ChatGPT traffic, massive quarterly losses of $12 billion, and unsustainable costs for tools like Sora. Key departures and Elon Musk's lawsuit further highlight significant internal turmoil and financial strain.

title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang shares ‘only regret’ and it involves a Mercedes S-Class
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang shared a lighthearted regret about selling Nvidia stock worth billions today to buy his parents a Mercedes-Benz S-Class when the company's market cap was $300 million. He also described AI as a 'five-layer cake' driving the largest infrastructure buildout in history, creating jobs across various sectors.

title: 'What I saw in Goa was something I could have never imagined'
content: The author, a travel writer, finds Goa's charm not in its crowded beaches but in its quiet hinterlands and unexpected encounters with local art.  A past unpleasant tourist experience led to a preference for offbeat exploration, revealing the state's lush monsoon beauty and serene village life, far from the typical tourist trail.

title: Anthony Lynn emerges as early contender to replace Sean McDermott in Buffalo
content: Anthony Lynn has emerged as an early candidate to replace Sean McDermott as the Bills’ head coach, according to ESPN’s Adam Schefter. A former Bills assistant and ex-Chargers head coach, Lynn brings familiarity with the organization and years of NFL experience. Buffalo leadership is expected to address his reported link to the job during an upcoming press conference.

title: Lucas Hernandez accused of exploiting Colombian family in explosive report
content: Lucas Hernández has been accused of human trafficking and labor exploitation after a Paris Match report said a Colombian family worked for him in France without contracts, legal papers, or social security registration. The complaint, filed with the Versailles prosecutor’s office, alleges long work hours, cash payments, and falsified documents. The claims remain under review.

title: UFC fans react as Donald Trump moderates Dana White–Jake Paul encounter
content: UFC CEO Dana White and boxing star Jake Paul shared an unexpected, albeit tense, moment at the College Football Playoff National Championship. Spotted in President Donald Trump's private suite, the duo, known for their public spats, engaged in a brief conversation, reportedly about Paul's recent injury. This encounter occurred amidst discussions for a historic UFC event at the White House.

title: Who is Cece? Twitch streamer at center of Marvel Rivals Creator Cup controversy
content: Twitch streamer Cecee faced online backlash after a heated incident during a Marvel Rivals tournament.  She insulted a teammate during a live match.  Cecee later apologized, admitting her mistakes as team captain.  She stated she reacted emotionally and failed to de-escalate the situation.  The streamer promised to improve her leadership skills.

title: 'Hardest job after PM's': Shashi Tharoor praises 'old friend' Gautam Gambhir; lauds his calmness
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor lauded new Indian cricket coach Gautam Gambhir in Nagpur, calling his role immensely challenging. Tharoor praised Gambhir's composure amidst constant public scrutiny and his quiet determination. He wished the coach success as India embarks on a crucial white-ball schedule, including preparations for the 2026 T20 World Cup.

title: 'They called me daddy': Did Trump confuse Greenland with Iceland?
content: During the World Economic Forum, President Trump continued to conflate Iceland and Greenland, suggesting NATO members' affection for him waned after he discussed Iceland. He described his request for Greenland as a "piece of ice" vital for global peace, contrasting it with NATO's decades of benefits.

title: Trump shadow over FIFA WC: Will France boycott event over Greenland row?
content: France's sports minister stated the government is not considering a boycott of the 2026 World Cup in the United States, despite political tensions. While emphasizing sport's separation from politics, she acknowledged the situation could evolve. The remarks follow US President Trump's comments on Greenland, raising concerns among European allies.

title: Aamir Khan moves in with girlfriend Gauri Spratt at new Mumbai home
content: Aamir Khan and Gauri Spratt have moved in together in Mumbai, confirming their serious and committed relationship. While marriage isn't an immediate plan, Khan expressed deep emotional commitment, stating he already feels married to Gauri. Gauri, a mother of one, is now professionally involved with his production house, further intertwining their lives.

title: Bangladesh face T20 WC exit: ICC rejects venue shift request; votes to replace team
content: The ICC has rejected Bangladesh's request to shift T20 World Cup matches from India, threatening to replace them if they refuse to travel. This decision follows a dispute over pacer Mustafizur Rahman's IPL removal and Bangladesh's subsequent ban on IPL broadcasts. Scotland is poised to replace Bangladesh if they maintain their stance.

title: K'taka Guv vs Sidda govt: Gehlot refuses to address joint session; what triggered row
content: Karnataka governor Thaawarchand Gehlot has refused to deliver the customary address to the legislature, adding to a recent trend of gubernatorial disputes. This follows similar incidents in Kerala and Tamil Nadu, where governors clashed with state governments over speech content and assembly proceedings. The Karnataka government is set to meet the governor to understand his reasons.

title: Daryl dethrones Kohli to claim No.1 ODI ranking; Rohit slips to fourth
content: Daryl Mitchell has ascended to the top of the men's ODI batting rankings, surpassing Virat Kohli after a stellar series against India. Mitchell's consecutive centuries powered New Zealand's victory and earned him the No. 1 spot with 845 rating points. Ibrahim Zadran also climbed to third, while Glenn Phillips reached 20th.

title: Canada PM's speech rocks Davos: Trump in crosshairs; big 'unite' message for India
content: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney warned the world order is breaking apart, not evolving, during a speech at the World Economic Forum. He urged middle powers like India to unite against great power rivalry and coercion, emphasizing collective resilience over appeasement.

title: Budget 2026 income tax: Will GST-style fewer tax slabs be brought under new income tax regime?
content: Budget 2026 income tax expectations: Will FM Nirmala Sitharaman reduce the number of tax slabs under the new income tax regime to ease compliance and reduce confusion for taxpayers? Times of India Online asks tax experts:

title: 'The loneliest moment in life': Quote of the day by F Scott Fitzgerald
content: F. Scott Fitzgerald, a literary giant, captured the dazzling yet hollow spirit of America's Jazz Age. His personal struggles with wealth and love fueled his iconic novel, The Great Gatsby, a poignant critique of the American Dream. Despite initial lukewarm reception, Gatsby's enduring themes of class, illusion, and doomed aspirations have cemented its status as a timeless masterpiece.

title: Caught on cam: Moment when IAF plane 'force landed' in UP
content: An Indian Air Force trainer aircraft crash-landed in Prayagraj after an engine failure mid-air. The aircraft deployed an emergency parachute, allowing for a safe force-landing in an uninhabited area, with both pilots unharmed. This incident follows another aviation emergency earlier this month involving a regional connectivity flight.

title: Trump's Board of Peace: Is UN the real target? China emerges as unlikely defender
content: China has said it will firmly defend a United Nations–centred global order after receiving an invitation from the United States to join President Donald Trump’s proposed Gaza Board of Peace. While Beijing has not confirmed whether it will accept the offer, it stressed its commitment to the UN system and international law. The invitation has led to debate over whether the new board could emerge as a parallel peace mechanism and what it could mean for existing multilateral institutions and power balances

title: 19 innings, no fifty: Is 'lap shot' behind SKY’s lean patch? Ex-cricketer decodes
content: Former pacer Varun Aaron believes Suryakumar Yadav's recent T20I struggles stem from shot selection and difficulty with slower deliveries. Aaron suggests batting Suryakumar at number four, similar to his IPL role, to improve his consistency and address concerns ahead of the T20 World Cup.

title: 'Pata nahi kab khelne ko milega': Samson breaks silence on missed chances - Watch
content: Sanju Samson, India's first-choice keeper for the 2026 T20 World Cup, reflects on his decade-long journey marked by failures and successes.  Having returned to his preferred opening role, Samson emphasizes his fearless approach and the importance of his bond with captain Suryakumar Yadav. He remains driven by a hunger to contribute positively.

title: B'desh crisis: Centres urges kin of officials to leave Dhaka; uptick in anti-India stirs
content: In response to escalating anti-India protests and potential violence in Bangladesh, India has advised families of its diplomats and officials stationed there to return home. This precautionary measure aims to ensure safety, though all Indian missions and posts in Bangladesh remain fully operational. The situation is temporary and will be reassessed.

title: Found a job, heaven knows I’m miserable: Why this Smiths lyric feels ' real' for Gen Z
content: A Smiths lyric from 1984 has become an unlikely anthem for Gen Z’s relationship with work. Drawing on viral online stories and recent research, the article explores why young people feel burned out, disengaged, and dissatisfied both during the job hunt and after getting hired—and how many are questioning whether traditional work can still deliver meaning or fulfilment.

title: 'Drawn to new ideas': Deepinder Goyal resigns as CEO of Zomato parent company Eternal
content: Zomato's parent company Eternal Limited CEO Deepinder Goyal is stepping down from his role, subject to shareholder approval, to pursue high-risk, experimental ideas outside the public company. He will transition to Vice Chairman on the board, with Albinder Dhindsa named as his successor.

title: Klay Thompson’s heartfelt gesture for Megan Thee Stallion leaves fans emotional
content: Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion have inspired billions around the world with the love and commitment they have shown towards each other over the past few months. While Megan Thee Stallion has often spoken out about how grateful she is for Klay Thompson, the star player’s recent gesture has sparked chaos among fans.

title: Civic polls: Eknath Shinde's Shiv Sena gets 'helping hand' from MNS in Kalyan-Dombivli
content: In a significant post-poll development, the Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) has extended support to the Shiv Sena in the Kalyan–Dombivli Municipal Corporation. This alliance, with MNS's five corporators backing the Shiv Sena's 53, brings the total to 58, inching closer to the required majority for forming the civic body's government.

title: Pakistan offers to host Bangladesh's T20 WC matches amid standoff with India
content: Pakistan has offered to host Bangladesh's T20 World Cup matches, backing Dhaka's refusal to play in India due to security concerns. The ICC is set to decide Bangladesh's participation amid ongoing talks. Bangladesh insists on shifting venues, while the ICC prefers the original schedule. This standoff follows recent IPL-related directives impacting Bangladeshi players.

title: Watch: Outrage over half-naked men waving hookahs in Sonmarg; dancing to ‘Jaata Ka Chhora’
content: A video of bare-chested youths dancing to a Haryanvi song with hookahs in Sonmarg has sparked outrage in Kashmir. Political leaders and civil society condemned the act as provocative and disrespectful to local sentiments and cultural norms, highlighting the insensitivity of the behavior in a peaceful tourist destination.

title: Md Shami, with 462 wickets for India, falls in line for SIR
content: Md Shami, the Indian cricket sensation, took a bold stand for democracy as he attended a voter hearing in Kolkata, wholeheartedly affirming his citizenship. Under scrutiny as an 'unmapped voter' due to his parents' details, Shami brought along his passport to validate his identity and showcased his dedication to the community he represents.

title: Australian Open: When Sachin's childhood idol became first to be disqualified from a Grand Slam
content: At the 1990 Australian Open, tennis icon John McEnroe was disqualified from his fourth-round match, becoming the first player in the Open Era to be defaulted from a Grand Slam for triple court violations. This infamous incident occurred on January 21, marking a significant moment in tennis history.

title: After Elon Musk's X Poll On "Buying Ryanair", A Reminder From Its CEO
content: Ryanair chief executive Michael O'Leary on Wednesday reminded billionaire Elon Musk that European Union rules prohibit non-Europeans from controlling the Irish airline, in the latest instalment of their public spat.

title: Can Poll Body Exercise Its Powers Like "Unruly Horse?" Supreme Court On SIR
content: Hearing arguments on the legality of the SIR, the Supreme Court on Wednesday asked if the Election Commission of India enjoys "untrammelled powers" to deviate from its own rules and provisions of the RP Act for the preparation of electoral rolls.

title: 'US Alone Can Protect Greenland': Top Trump Quotes At Davos 2026
content: Trump's arrival in the Swiss Alps community of Davos was delayed after a minor electrical issue aboard Air Force One had forced a return to Washington to switch aircraft, but it wasn't expected to push back his scheduled keynote speech.

title: 'Canada Lives Because Of US, Remember That Mark': Trump At Davos
content: US President Donald Trump, in his address at Davos, said that Canada should be grateful to Washington because they get many "freebies" from the US. "Canada lives because of the United States," Trump said.

title: What The US Exit From A Piracy-Fighting Pact Means For Asia
content: President Donald Trump's decision to pull the United States out of a key Asian maritime security initiative earlier this month comes at a sensitive moment for the Indo-Pacific.

title: "What The Hell Happened": Trump Mocks Macron's Sunglasses In Davos Speech
content: US President Donald Trump mocked French President Emmanuel Macron on Wednesday for the aviator sunglasses he was wearing during his own speech at Davos the day before.

title: EU Parliament Freezes Approval Of US Trade Deal Over Trump's Greenland Threats
content: EU lawmakers have agreed to hold off ratifying a key trade deal with the United States following President Donald Trump's tariff threats over Greenland.

title: Trump's Greenland Ultimatum In Davos: "Say No And We Will Remember"
content: Delivering a much-awaited speech at the World Economic Forum in Switzerland's Davos as the world braced for another dose of 'America First' rhetoric and a doubling down on Greenland, US President Donald Trump did not disappoint on Wednesday.

title: "Stopped 8 Wars, Including India-Pak": Trump Reiterates In Davos
content: Donald Trump once again underlined that he stopped eight wars, including the four-day India-Pakistan conflict in May last year, at the World Economic Forum in Davos on Wednesday.

title: India's Defence Push: New UAE Deal, Rising Exports And Growing Global Reach
content: India and the United Arab Emirates (UAE) have deepened their strategic partnership by signing a $3 billion LNG supply agreement between ADNOC Gas and HPCL (0.5 mtpa for 10 years starting 2028), along with a Letter of Intent (LoI).

title: Over 300 Journalists In Jail For 5th Straight Year: Report
content: The number of journalists imprisoned worldwide for their work was 330 in the final month of 2025, the Committee to Protect Journalists said Wednesday, the fifth consecutive year the count has exceeded 300.

title: Prince Harry Says Tabloids Made Wife Meghan Markle's Life "Absolute Misery"
content: A highly emotional Prince Harry told a UK court Wednesday that two British tabloids he is suing for unlawful information-gathering made his wife Meghan's life "an absolute misery".

title: US Stocks Rise After Trump Says Won't Take Greenland With Force
content: Wall Street stocks opened higher Wednesday after US President Donald Trump said he wouldn't seize Greenland with force while insisting on "immediate negotiations" to make it a US territory.

title: 'US Is Economic Engine, Europe Unrecognisable': Trump Unfiltered At Davos
content: Europe is not headed in the right direction, President Donald Trump said at the World Economic Forum in Davos today, as relationship turned hostile between a superpower and once-close allies.

title: Trump Calls Greenland "Our Territory" But Won't Use Force To Acquire It
content: President Donald Trump insisted he won't use force to acquire Greenland in a speech at the World Economic Forum, where he said that the US is booming but Europe is "not heading in the right direction."

title: 'Want Immediate Negotiations To Purchase Greenland': Trump In Davos
content: US President Donald Trump on Wednesday called for immediate negotiations toward a deal to acquire Greenland, adding that he would not use force in his campaign for the northern island.

title: Live: Trump Calls Denmark 'Ungrateful' Over Greenland During Davos Speech
